name: Environment and Health Justice Support
goal: Health and Environment Justice Support aims to achieve a healthy environment and environmental justice for affected people. It provides long term technical, policy and awareness raising support for environmentally deprived active communities to enable them to make their problems heard and to strive for solutions. HEJSupport works on policy level to achieve a healthy environment and environmental justice globally and in Europe.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Development, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health
